title: Ellis Island, New York City
marks:
Signature; Title; Edition

in pencil, bottom edg in pencil, LRC on back: [Toby Old 1983]
description: shabby room with worn hexagonal tile floor and peeling paint on walls and ceiling; 3 sinks in R corner; old medical equipment scattered throughout, including a crutch, a folding screen, stools, a wheelchair and a cart with a wash basin
creditline: Gift of the Artist, by exchange
